A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Whilst the start of the movie was very entertaining\, with good visual effects and fantastic space scenes\, we were soon confronted to Disney's own version of Star Wars\, which in my opinion (and for many fans)\, badly represents the franchise and threw away the 40 years worth of expanded universe material which surrounds it.

The movie was sloppy and far too long. It had a huge amount of potential but this was thrown away for new underdeveloped\, pointless characters\, and obvious plot holes.

I can honestly say that this movie was disappointing.
